ai-iti19:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti19:2.1_0: “One thing, mendicants, arises in the world for the welfare and happiness of the people, for the benefit, welfare, and happiness of gods and humans.
ai-iti19:2.4_0: When the Saṅgha is in harmony, they don’t argue, insult, block, or reject each other.
ai-iti19:2.5_0: This inspires confidence in those without it, and increases confidence in those who have it.”
ai-iti19:2.6_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti19:3.2_0: And to help in fostering harmony.
ai-iti19:3.3_0: Taking a stand on the teaching,
ai-iti19:3.6_0: He rejoices in heaven for an eon.’”
ai-iti19:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
